access_description: You need a key to enter the Laundromat

menu.title: How much money would you like to wash?

loading.notify_nodirty_description: You do not have enough dirty money to wash
loading.notify_invalid_description: Please enter a valid amount to wash

washing.notify_started_description: You have started the washing process
washing.notify_finished_description: You have finished washing all of your money

drying.notify_success_description: You have dried all of your wet bills
